p: Thirty-nine countries reported treatment data. The highest number of papers was published by the USA ( n = 25, reporting 2559 treatment courses), followed by China ( n = 16, reporting 14,680 treatment courses) and Spain ( n = 16, reporting 4103 treatment courses). Country-level data describing the number of publications and treatment courses described and the first date of patient enrolment in prospective research (where relevant) are shown in Additional file 1: appendix 5).
